description.text: this message file contains messages for ibistool tool

msg.text: Report file $$s should have either .pad or .ncd extension.
Input file $$s is not a valid NCD.
Failed to write out IBIS models.\n

Check the master ibis file at isptools/cae_library/ for models,
if the model is not present in the master ibis file, please contact
Lattice Technical Support to make a request for this model.

Usage: $$s

 write out design ibis models.
Ibis Model '$$s' for the signal '$$s' is not available.\n
Ibis Model '$$s' for the signal '$$s' is not available. Substituting model '$$s'.\n
Failed to load Iobuf information from the pad file $$s.\n

Note: The IBIS models for True Differential
have a known issue in the IBIS data. Please use
SC HSPICE models instead to run simulation.
Failed to load $$s info from the ibs file.\n
The design and master IBIS files are different.\n Part name is $$s while IBIS file component name is $$s.\n
Package name '$$s' is not found in the master ibis file: $$s.\n
Input model '$$s' for signal '$$s' is not available.\n
Design IBIS models are generated for board level analysis.\n
There is no SERDES used in the design.\n\n
Design IBIS AMI Models are generated for board level analysis.\n
Currently, IBIS-AMI only supports 64 bit Linux.\n\n
